
Lower limit
=IF(B3<138573,"Weight below Minimum Flight Weight",
 IF(B3<=204116,7.5,
 IF(B3<=237682,(10.5-7.5)/(237682-204116)*B3-((10.5-7.5)/(237682-204116)*204116-7.5),
 IF(B3<=251290,(11.5-10.5)/(251290-237682)*B3-((11.5-10.5)/(251290-237682)*237682-10.5),
 IF(B3<=325996,(15.4-11.5)/(325996-251290)*B3-((15.4-11.5)/(325996-251290)*251290-11.5),
 IF(B3<=345455,(17.8-15.4)/(345455-325996)*B3-((17.8-15.4)/(345455-325996)*325996-15.4),
 IF(B3<=352441,(22-17.8)/(352441-345455)*B3-((22-17.8)/(352441-345455)*345455-17.8),
 IF(B3>352441,"Weight above Max Taxi Weight"))))))))

Upper limit
=IF(B3<138573,"Weight below Minimum Flight Weight",
 IF(B3<=158031,(34.1-26.9)/(158031-138573)*B3-((34.1-26.9)/(158031-138573)*138573-26.9),
 IF(B3<=224029,(44-34.1)/(224029-158031)*B3-((44-34.1)/(224029-158031)*158031-34.1),
 IF(B3<=279911,44,
 IF(B3<=304814,44,
 IF(B3<=343414,(38.1-44)/(343414-304814)*B3-((38.1-44)/(343414-304814)*304814-44),
 IF(B3<=352441,(27.4-38.1)/(352441-343414)*B3-((27.4-38.1)/(352441-343414)*343414-38.1),
 IF(B3>352441,"Weight above Max Taxi Weight"))))))))
